thread.title: George Clooney Dishes on His First Year of Marriage
thread.title_full: George Clooney Dishes on His First Year of Marriage

author: Joi-Marie McKenzie
title: George Clooney Dishes on His First Year of Marriage
text:
Share Article 
ABC/Randy Holmes (LOS ANGELES) -- George and Amal Clooney just celebrated their first wedding anniversary, but they're still acting like newlyweds. 
Married life has been a blast said the Oscar winner. "We sure are having fun," he told People magazine. "We had a beautiful anniversary, and we're having fun." 
Clooney wed the high-profile lawyer last September in Venice after several months of dating. 
The actor isn't giving too many personal details about his relationship, demurring when asked what he's learned in his first year of marriage. 
"That's a good question, but I can't officially tell you any of those things," he said. "That would be wrong, and [Amal] would be upset that I told anyone what I've learned!" 
  Wednesday, September 30, 2015 at 10:00PM by
